articles.title: Covid vaccination, not travel curbs: WHO lists ways to battle Omicron - Livemint
articles.description: Omicron has gained a foothold in Asia, Africa, the Americas, the Middle East and Europe and has reached seven of the nine provinces of South Africa, where it was first identified
articles.content: Countries should focus on boosting healthcare capacity and increasing vaccination coverage to curb any surge in Covid-19 cases driven by the Omicron variant, the World Health Organisation (WHO) has s… [+3880 chars]

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Americans say life's too short to waste on work - RT
articles.description: New surveys published this week show that American workers who lost or quit jobs during the Covid-19 pandemic may not rejoin the workforce anytime soon, if at all.
articles.content:
The US Chamber of Commerce recently polled 529 Americans who became unemployed during the pandemic and have yet to return to work.
Over half of the respondents (53%) said they are somewhat active or… [+2372 chars]

articles.author: The Economist
articles.title: Didi’s delisting sounds the death knell for Chinese IPOs in America - The Economist
articles.description: The ride-hailing app’s misadventure on the New York Stock Exchange was short-lived
articles.content: FEW BLOCKBUSTER public share sales have been as tortured as Didi Globals. Within four days of raising $4.4bn in New York in June the Chinese ride-hailing group was hit with an investigation by the au… [+3283 chars]

articles.title: Tech stocks slump in Hong Kong as Didi prepares for US delisting - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Losses were exacerbated by US regulators finalising plans for a new law that could see Chinese companies booted off American bourses.

articles.author: Luke Goodsell
articles.title: Disney’s Encanto celebrates family, Colombian culture - and the music of Lin-Manuel Miranda - ABC News
articles.description: A misfit teen from a magical family finds her own rhythm in this sweet-natured coming-of-age movie, which represents Disney’s first serious engagement with modern Latin American culture.
